sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Rightsidebar.css"; const Friendactivity = () => { // Hardcoded posts data const posts = [ { id: 1, author: "Jane Doe", avatar: "../../assets/janedoe.jpg", content: 'Just finished a great book! 📚 Highly recommend "The Midnight Library" by Matt Haig.', timestamp: "2 hours ago", likes: 15, comments: 3, }, { id: 2, author: "John Smith", avatar: "/placeholder.svg?height=40&width=40", content: "Beautiful day for a hike! 🏞️ #NatureLover", timestamp: "4 hours ago", likes: 24, comments: 5, }, { id: 3, author: "Alice Johnson", avatar: "/placeholder.svg?height=40&width=40", content: "Just adopted this cutie! 🐶 Meet Max, my new furry friend.", timestamp: "6 hours ago", likes: 42, comments: 8, }, ]; return (

Friend Activity

{posts.map((post) => (

{post.author}

{post.timestamp}

{post.content}

))}
); }; export default Friendactivity;
